T02D2345:3a-1: bha ba na drishti ts'arya pha la do ha g'i ti ka n'a ma /
T02D2345:3a-3: lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu'i do ha'i glu zhes bya ba /
T02D2345:3a-5: dngos po sna tshogs rang gi sems nyid yin //
T02D2345:3a-6: 'khor 'das thams cad rnal 'byor dbyer med pa //
T02D2345:3a-7: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med pa ste //
T02D2345:3a-8: dper na chu dang de yi rlabs bzhin no //
T02D2345:3a-9: dngos dang dngos min spangs pa'i sems nyid 'di //
T02D2345:3a-10: rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor skad cig gcig la ni //
T02D2345:3a-11: sgron me chung du zhig gis mun pa ltar ;
T02D2345:3a-12: /'khor ba'i dug lnga rang bzhin rab rib sel //
T02D2345:3a-13: zung 'jug phyag rgya blo 'das chen po ni //
T02D2345:3a-14: bde gsal mi rtog nam mkha' lta bu ste //
T02D2345:3a-15: khyab cing rgya chen snying rje chen po'i ngo //
T02D2345:3a-16: snang yang rang bzhin med pa chu zla bzhin //
T02D2345:3a-17: gsal yang tha snyad mtha' dbus kun dang bral //
T02D2345:3b-0: gang @3b gis ma gos dri med re dogs bral //
T02D2345:3b-1: lkugs pa'i rmi lam bzhin du smra mi shes //
T02D2345:3b-2: tshad med bde chen rang bzhin yi shes ni //
T02D2345:3b-3: nyi zla'i 'od bzhin phyogs dang bral ba med //
T02D2345:3b-4: kye ho rnal 'byor 'byung ngo mtshar che //
T02D2345:3b-5: gnyug ma ma bcos sems ni chos sku ste //
T02D2345:3b-6: bcos pa'i sems kyis rnal 'byor thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2345:3b-7: de phyir bde ba'i phyogs su yan par mthong //
T02D2345:3b-8: rang bzhin grub pa'i lam thob rnal 'byor bde //
T02D2345:3b-9: rnam rtog bral bas zhe 'dod 'byung mi srid //
T02D2345:3b-10: rta mgrin grub thob bdag nyid sar has smras //
T02D2345:3b-11: kye ho rnal 'byor lta ba'i nyams len gyis //
T02D2345:3b-12: de yi rang bzhin gang zhig sgom 'dod na //
T02D2345:3b-13: rang lus ri bo 'di ni gnas kyi mchog //
T02D2345:3b-14: sems nyid dus kyi rnal 'byor sgrub pa po //
T02D2345:3b-15: dbang po rnams bcings mtshams bcad pa de bar 'gyur //
T02D2345:3b-16: g-yengs ba rnams kyang ched du spang mi bya //
T02D2345:3b-17: tug phrad sems su shes na yi dam lha //
T02D2345:3b-18: shes pa ma bkug rtog pa rim gyis spangs //
T02D2345:3b-19: sems la rnam rtog byung na rnal 'byor bas //
T02D2345:3b-20: ras bal 'dab ma bzhin du glod la zhog / bya ba spongs la rang sems rang gis ltos //
T02D2345:3b-21: zhe 'dod byung na bdud du shes par gyis //
T02D2345:3b-22: rnam rtog rnams kyi rtsa ba sems yin te //
T02D2345:3b-23: de med phyir na rnam rtog yod min no //
T02D2345:3b-24: dran pa dran ming bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor te //
T02D2345:3b-25: sems 'di rtag par ma grub rang la thim //
T02D2345:3b-26: bsgom 'dod med pas sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob //
T02D2345:3b-27: rnal 'byor bu chung lta bur rtog pa med //
T02D2345:3b-28: ldum ra'i bud pas me tog ro myang ltar //
T02D2345:3b-29: nags nas nags su 'khyam pa seng ge bzhin //
T02D2345:3b-30: kun du rgyu ba sna tshogs rlung ltar ni //
T02D2345:3b-31: sems nyid bag dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog / rang bzhin mi dgag smyon pa lta bur spyod //
T02D2345:3b-32: rgyab tu mi chags mdun du zhen pa med //
T02D2345:3b-33: mdor na lta sgom spyod pa nyams len la //
T02D2345:3b-34: ji ltar phan pa'i spyod pas rnal 'byor spyod //
T02D2345:3b-35: sna tshogs snang ba sems kyi ngo bo 'di //
T02D2345:3b-36: tug phrad tsam gyis ma grub phyag rgya che //
T02D2345:3b-37: snang la mi snang 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'byung //
T02D2345:3b-38: de la sems na dngos grub dam pa yin //
T02D2345:3b-39: phyi nang thams cad lhan cig skyes pa 'di //
T02D2345:4a-0: rnam rtog chu bo'i rgyun gyi rnal 'byor @4a * //
T02D2345:4a-2: de yang sems las gzhan na btsal du med //
T02D2345:4a-3: yid la mi gzhag phyag rgya chen po'i lam //
T02D2345:4a-4: 'bras bu ma re rtogs na phyag rgya che //
T02D2345:4a-5: ma rtogs rtog pa nam mkha'i sprin dang 'dra //
T02D2345:4a-6: rtogs na de nyid rang bzhin stong pa yin //
T02D2345:4a-7: lta spyod 'bras bu dbyer med lhan cig skyes //
T02D2345:4a-8: rang bzhin dbyer med rtogs na 'bras bu'i mchog /
T02D2345:4a-9: lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu do ha'i glu zhes
